Maximum Annual Credit for Selected Benefit Type
Enter any remarks regarding the receipt. (Optional)

On sale of every Product; you will receive Primary Points and Secondary Points on the App. You can use the Primary Points to redeem rewards within the app; whereas, Secondary Points are those that get accumulated in your account to reward your customers when they make a sale. These accumulated Secondary Points will be added back to your Primary Points Wallet after 12 months from the date they were awarded in case your customers have not made a sale.
